overview: Veronica Richardson, a girl who has never been with a good man, is caught off guard when true love finds its way to her doorstep. It is up to her if she wants to let it in or shut it out. Damaged and heartbroken from a past childhood friend, Veronica had lost all hope to ever be able to love again.
tagline: Sometimes love comes from right next door.
title: When Love Comes Knocking
